definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
rice bowl/fig. livelihood/job/way of making a living
lit. to hold a bowl of water level (idiom)/fig. to be impartial
lit. eyeing what's in the pot as one eats from one's bowl (idiom)/not content with what one already has/(of men, typically) to have the wandering eye
pinyin: chi1 zhe5 wan3 li3 , kan4 zhe5 guo1 li3

definition: see 吃著碗裡，看著鍋裡|吃着碗里，看着锅里[chi1 zhe5 wan3 li3 , kan4 zhe5 guo1 li3]
pinyin: chi1 zhe5 wan3 li3 , qiao2 zhe5 guo1 li3

sentences.english: Tao Okamoto’s 'rice bowl' hair may be the most valuable cut in the world.
sentences.chinese: 岡本多緒的碗狀頭或許是世界上最昂貴的髮型了。

sentences.english: She put a dollop if ice-cream in each bowl.
sentences.chinese: 她在每個碗裏放了一團冰淇淋。

sentences.english: She used the cup for a soup bowl.
sentences.chinese: 她把那個杯子用作盛湯的碗。

sentences.english: Put sesame paste in a bowl, mix 2tbsp cool boiled water to mix well.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻醬放在碗裏，加涼開水50克調勻。

sentences.english: Place cucumber, green pepper and onion into a large salad bowl, salt them.
sentences.chinese: 將黃瓜，青椒和洋蔥放在大的色拉碗中，加鹽醃。

sentences.english: He dashed the bowl to bits on a rock.
sentences.chinese: 他把碗跌在岩石上摔得粉碎。

sentences.english: Yes. I like the picture of horse.
Would you pay $1.4 million for a bowl of strawberries?
sentences.chinese: 你願意爲一個草莓碗一百四十點零萬美元？

sentences.english: Romance is every time I eat a bowl of left Douer you will help me to pass out.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫是我每次喫飯留下的碗兜兒你都會幫我打發掉。

sentences.english: The dog was so hungry that he left next to nothing in his food bowl.
sentences.chinese: 那隻狗餓得把碗裏的食物喫得幾乎不剩。

sentences.english: She counted three bowls with nice food in them.
sentences.chinese: 她數了一下，有三個碗，碗裏盛了可口的食物。

sentences.english: She counted three bowls with nice food in them.
sentences.chinese: 她數了一下，有三個碗，碗裏盛了可口的食物。

sentences.english: You should eat up every grains of rice in your bowl.
sentences.chinese: 你應將碗中的米飯喫得一粒不剩。

sentences.english: Combine powdered sugar and 2 tablespoons lemon juice in small bowl.
sentences.chinese: 在一小碗中將糖粉及2湯匙檸檬汁混勻。

sentences.english: Sift the flour into a bowl with the salt.
sentences.chinese: 把麪粉篩進碗裏，和鹽拌勻。

sentences.english: We spread white covers over the bowls to keep flies away.
sentences.chinese: 我們在碗上鋪了白的覆蓋物防止蒼蠅。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
